citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany inspector for an Animal Welfare Act inspection from 12:35pm
until 1:05pm on 08/05/2014.
Correct upon receipt.
.
This was a 1st attempted inspection
